A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
(Spoiler Free)
The Worst Star Wars Film
Starts out with a kinda stupid joke\, setting a unsettling tone for the rest of a pretty dark themed movie.
Has unnecessary subplots and characters.
Villains are stupid and unmenacing.
Left the movie very conflicted.
Has plot holes that makes the movie worse the more you think about it.
Its not a carbon copy of Episode V: The Empire Strikes Back.
Would be better as a copy of The Empire Strikes Back.
Execution of the revelation of Rey's parents was done poorly.
No background of how Snoke or almost anything really.
SciFi/Star Wars rules were broken.(Shields nonexistent) Hyperspace as a weapon.
Makes Force Awakens and the prequels look better.
